thread.title: Khangal Ariungerel

author: Khangal Ariungerel
title: Khangal Ariungerel
text: Order has been delayed in shipping because my credit card needed validation. No email was sent asking for validation until I emailed asking where my shipping details were. They then emailed me saying they need a picture of my credit card within 7 days or my order is cancelled. Now my order is sitting in a nearby city but UPS doesn't deliver sat, sun or holidays.
